metadata.description:
Data on Drosophila, Zebrafish, and C. elegans model systems in scientific publications from African laboratories from the year 2000 to 2021.

Preprints paper https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2022.12.30.522314v1
metadata.title: Datasets and figures for simple models of neuroscience research discoveries

metadata.description:
A presentation we made during our graduation at Open Life Science (OLS) programme. The OLS program is for people interested in applying open principles in their work and becoming Open Science ambassadors in their communities. The slide deck describes our initiative for establishing Open Science Community Nigeria (OSCN) in April 2022 as a scientist-driven nonprofit organisation working to embed open science principles and practices, promote openness, transparency and reproducibility in science among scientists, network of researchers and societal stakeholders in Nigeria. More details can be found in the following links:-

Github repo: https://github.com/Open-Science-Community-Nigeria

OSCN in Zenodo:  https://zenodo.org/communities/oscnigeria/?page=1&size=20
metadata.title: Open Science Community Nigeria (OSCN)

creators.affiliation: Bauchi State University
creators.name: Ahmad Umar

metadata.title: Reproducibility in Cancer Transcriptomics Research

creators.affiliation: Bauchi State University
creators.name: Ahmad Umar

metadata.description:
This is the application for Software Sustainability Institute 2023 Fellowship Application. I explained my plans for the fellowship as follows

  • To develop bioinformatics and computational genomics course 

  • To develop short courses in areas of data science using R & Python

  • To develop short training modules about preprints and open science

I would like to be part of the SSI fellowship because the SSI community highly compliments my own goals and passion to promote Open Science and develop the capacity of our local scientists, computationally.

 

This slide deck was presented in video format while making application for the 2023 Software Sustainability Institute Fellowship.
metadata.title: Software Sustainability Institute 2023 Fellowship Application
